name: Woo Subcategory Thumb
author: raficsedu

sections.description:
When you click a category in woocommerce , then all products listed under that category . But if the category has some sub category then is not displayed . So Woocommerce Subcategory Thumb plugin will display the sub categories thumb as along with product . See the screenshot .

NB : wootheme compatible only .

If you have suggestions or bugfixes for the plugin, contact me in my official site (http://myplugin.tophostbd.com/)

If you want to translate the plugin into your language, contact me
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin and see your result in front-end .

short_description: Display sub categories as a thumb in parent category page
